title.rendered: Our 5 Best Mobile Phone Deals For £25 Or Less

content.rendered:
Here at Fonehouse we’re always banging on about how we love to give you our lowest prices ever, and how we’re always on the hunt for the very best mobile phone deals and the very best prices. And that’s no lie.

But sometimes hunting down a great value pay monthly contract deal can be an arduous task, which handset do you go for? What data package do you need? Are there any extras? Often, with other companies, you might find sales staff trying to get you to pay “just a little more” to get yet another perk, but sometimes that’s not an option. You might have a very strict budget that you need stick to. Not to worry, at Fonehouse we always listen to our customers, and we’ll never take a pushy approach to our customer service.

That’s why in this blog post we’re bringing you our favourite mobile phone deals all for £25 or less! You’ll be amazed at what you can get for your money, and we won’t try to get you to pay a single penny more.  

Deal #1 – LG Q6

LG have an outstanding reputation in the smartphone industry. As pioneers of touchscreen technology they are a brand who really know what they’re doing when it comes to making great value phones that perform day in, day out.

The LG Q6 has to be one of our favourite LG smartphones, and luckily for you it comes with some amazing pay monthly deals. You can get your hands on the Q6 for just £23 per month and have nothing to pay upfront! On a Vodafone Red Extra plan you’ll get unlimited texts and minutes across 24 months with 4GB of data every month. On top of that you can even take advantage of one our great cashback offers and get £30 in your pocket.

Deal #2 – Sony Xperia XA2

Sony smartphones are incredibly popular at Fonehouse, and the Xperia XA2 is the perfect example of why. Not only is the Sony Xperia XA2 a great looking smartphone but it also boasts a high-quality camera and an amazing processor. The HD display is encased in a sleekly curved design that is robust enough to survive even the clumsiest of owners.

While it undeniably packs a lot of punch, the Xperia XA2 is one of our best value Sony handsets. You can order the Sony Xperia XA2 today and have nothing to pay upfront. You can get unlimited texts and minutes across 24 months for just £23 per month. On top of that you’ll get 2GB of data every month and £20 cashback, all on a great value EE Essential plan.

Deal #3 – Huawei P Smart

It seems like everyone has been raving about the Huawei P Smart since its release earlier this year; it really is an impressive smartphone, particularly for the price you pay.

Huawei focus on putting their innovative technology into all of their handsets, not just their high end releases. This means that with the P Smart you don’t just get a reliable smartphone, but a phone that features beautiful design, a FullView screen and an impressive camera set up with gesture shot technology.

At Fonehouse we offer some of the best Huawei mobile phone deals, especially on the P Smart. You can get unlimited texts and minutes, 1GB of data and £60 cashback for just £21 per month over 24 months on an EE Essential plan. So not only do you get a great new phone (which will arrive the very next day), but you also get some extra cash in your wallet!

Deal #4 – Samsung Galaxy S7

The Samsung Galaxy S7 is over two years old now, but is still an extremely reputable handset which is often regarded as one of the best smartphones around. It really put Samsung on the map and if you’re lucky enough to own you’ll know what we’re talking about when we say that this is a phone that doesn’t fail to impress.

You might think that you have to pay a significant amount for a contract on a phone of this calibre, but we have some amazing Samsung Galaxy S7 mobile phone deals available.

For just £25 per month you can get hold of the Galaxy S7 with unlimited minutes and texts and 4GB of data across 24 months on an EE Essential plan. With EE you guaranteed amazingly quick connectivity wherever you are, that’s what makes them one of the worlds best mobile communications providers, so your Galaxy S7 will always be able to perform.

This offer won’t be around forever, so be sure to catch it while you can.

Deal #5 – iPhone 6

Didn\’t expect to see an iPhone handset on this list? We understand. With all of the hype around iPhones other mobile phone retailers may use it as an excuse to charge more for an Apple handset. But not at Fonehouse; we’re dedicated to bringing you low prices across all mobile phone manufacturers.

You can get your hands on a 32GB iPhone 6 in sophisticated Space Grey for just £24 per month and secure unlimited texts and minutes and 4GB of data on a Vodafone Red Extra plan. This is one of our cheapest iPhone deals, and definitely one that you don’t want to miss out on.

So there you have it. Five great value smartphones with some amazing deals, and they won’t cost you a penny over £25! You can discover some of the best mobile phone deals at Fonehouse, and if you ever want to talk through your purchase then you can chat to our trusty customer service team who will be ready with a warm welcome to answer all of your questions.
